Manipulations.py¶

Functions in this file are manipulations of networkx graph.

lntk.manipulations.merge_nodes(G, nodes_to_merge, new_node_id)[source]¶

Merges a list of nodes in a graph

Parameters:
  • G – a networkx graph
  • nodes_to_merge – a list of node ids
  • new_node_id – an id for the new node
Returns:
